No password recovery option. So if you forget your password there's no way to recover your notes! üòî
replyContent: This app is designed to be secure for your personal data, so it doesn't have internet access and doesn't store your password anywhere outside of your device. Any password recovery system is potentially vulnerable. You only need to remember one password, other you can store in the app.

content: This software is great, it has everything which are we need. But if you make the color of the notepad white, it will be much better in reading and writing
Worth the money I think. All other notepads are shabby in some way

Truth: Id be deleting this had I not paid for it- want my money back. To be fair, the app runs well. Lots of functions, operates smoothly, out performs similar apps. But NOTHING about it is simple & no action is swift. Every function is multistep; even adding an item to a checklist requires multiple steps. Plus, there is just ONE font. And the app can't remember font color for each item within the SAME checklist = another step to match the font color each time an item is added. Ridiculous.

I have tried many of these but this is it. This is functional and polished. Great product. The only thing that would make it even better would be the ability to have more than one database, for example one for personal and one for work.
Most complete and securely designed note app that I've used. Definitely worth the purchase price!
Good app

Better than Note Everything. I upgraded to android v9 and Note Everything does not officially support it. I did get it installed, but it crashes on occasion. A search for an alternative found VIP Notes, and I think it is GOLD. I just need to be able to import my over 5 years of Note Everything notes into VIP Notes. The backups are not compatible. Zip vs vnbak. I hope this feature can be implemented. UPDATE: Using the android share feature out of Note Everything, worked well, but slow.

EXCELLENT! This is a powerful info-container tool (hierarchical notes, checklists, labels, attachments, reminders, encryption,...). One of the few hierarchical note managers that is able to receive and accept recommendation links shared from Google Play Store app. Yeah, the "possibility of internal links between folders and notes" and the "option to search in particular folder and its subfolders only" would be GREAT !!!

content: Easily the best note taking app around. You can encrypt all notes or just some. Attach anything you want, change colors/themes, zoom the text for easy reading. There's no sync (hint, hint) but I do backup/restore and that works fine. Money well spent.

This has been on my wishlist for quite some time, now I'm glad I finally purchased it. Now here's my review. This app definitely goes beyond modern notes and password management. It's got everything you would want on a note taking app and everything you would want on a password management tool. So it's like a merger of 2 apps, made even better. You can do so much with it yet it's so easy to use. You can even attach and encrypt large files and sync on multiple devices. I highly recommend. One request though, please add bullets and numbering in the text options. Thanks in advance!
replyContent: Thanks for the feedback. I will try to add the features you need in one of next update

content: Thank you so much..... U changed the bug in ur latest update. Excellent app...
replyContent: This bug was fixed. Update application please

content: Outstanding application! You can customize the UI to make it look exactly the way you want and the filing system makes it easy to locate everything. The only thing I wish it had was little thumbnails on the note listing. They're in the note, but not on the list. That would make it so much easier to spot the required old note.

Update 9th May 2018: Developer fixed bugs, VIP Notes is BEST secret Note 
App i ever use. Totally love it ... Great thanks to Developer
